Quickstrike:




Quickstrike grumbled lightly with the pain at his head. He felt Stingtra 
near-by and opened his optics. He saw the pillow she had and moved his body 
slowly over. It felt better from the hard ground. He rolled over onto his 
side and dimmed his optics again.
